H0.text: What kind of an organism is a truffle. **Bacteria**

H1.text: What kind of an organism is a truffle. **Alga**

H2.text: What kind of an organism is a truffle. **Slime Mold**

H3.text: What kind of an organism is a truffle. Fugus

A4.text: A truffle is the fruiting body of a subterranean ascomycete fungus, one of the species of the genus Tuber.

A5.text: Truffles are ectomycorrhizal fungi, so they are found in close association with tree roots.
